tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id UUID,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sender_address VARCHAR(255),
  receiver_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    seller_id UUID,
    buyer_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products (product_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_seller FOREIGN KEY (seller_id) REFERENCES sellers (seller_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_buyer FOREIGN KEY (buyer_id) REFERENCES buyers (buyer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_immutability (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_description TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    data_hash VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE data_immutable (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_type VARCHAR,
    data_value TEXT,
    data_hash VARCHAR,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    public_key VARCHAR,
    joined_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contract (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR,
    contract_address VARCHAR,
    contract_balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    deploy_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    contract_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE data_immutability (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    data_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    data_modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    supplier_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    product_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contract (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contract_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contract_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    contract_updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_account (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    last_login_date TIMESTAMP
);
